articles.author: Stuart Heritage
articles.title: The secret of Liam Neeson's success: a monomaniacal fixation on … tea? - The Guardian
articles.description: The perma-frowning Taken star has revealed that he will only consider a script worthwhile if it manages to stop him thinking about his next cuppa. How do you live like this?
articles.content: Its always fascinating to learn how actors choose their roles. In his autobiography, for instance, Bryan Cranston laid out an elaborate calculation where he grades each potential movie on the quality… [+3647 chars]
